export_document_failed.title: Exporting project(s) failed
export_document_failed.message: You must open a project before exporting it.

export_template_failed.title: Exporting template(s) failed
export_template_failed.message: You must open a template before exporting it.

context_menu_root.title: Error while removing
context_menu_root.message: You cannot delete the root node. To remove a project, do this in "My projects".

soft_remove_document_failed.title: Error while removing
soft_remove_document_failed.message: Could not move the project to the trash. Please try again.

soft_remove_document_success.title: Successfully removed
soft_remove_document_success.message: The project is now in the trash.

soft_remove_template_failed.title: Error while removing
soft_remove_template_failed.message: Could not move the template to the trash. Please try again.

soft_remove_template_success.title: Successfully removed
soft_remove_template_success.message: The template is now in the trash.

create_document_failed.title: Failed creating new project
create_document_failed.message: Could not create the new project. Please try again.

create_document_success.title: Project created
create_document_success.message: The project is ready to be used.

create_template_failed.title: Failed creating new template
create_template_failed.message: Could not create the new template. Please try again.

create_template_success.title: Template created
create_template_success.message: The template is ready to be used.

permanent_remove_failed.title: Permanent deletion failed
permanent_remove_failed.message: Could not delete the project/template. Please try again.

permanent_remove_success.title: Permanent deletion successful
permanent_remove_success.message: The project/template is now permanently deleted.

restore_failed.title: Failed restoring from trash
restore_failed.message: Could not restore the project/template. Please try again.

restore_success.title: Successfully restored
restore_success.message: The project/template is now restored and can be found in "My projects" or "My templates", respectively.

empty_trash_failed.title: Error while removing
empty_trash_failed.message: Could not empty the trash. Please try again, or try to delete one project at the time.

generation_docx_failed.title: Failed to generate .docx file
generation_docx_failed.message: Something unexpected happened while generating the .docx file. Please try again.

generation_docx_success.title: Generation was successful
generation_docx_success.message: The file is now assembled and gets opened in a new window. If you want to save the file to your desktop, click on "File->Save as" in the newly opened window.

generation_must_open_document.title: Generation of .docx file failed
generation_must_open_document.message: You must open a project to be able to generate the printable version.

max_number_of_subchapters.title: Limit of maximum nested subchapters
max_number_of_subchapters.message: You can have a maximum depth of 5 subchapters per chapter.

could_not_paste_as_file.title: Format not supported
could_not_paste_as_file.message: Could not store the pasted content as file. Try to either paste as regular, or attach the file manually below.
